verses.verse: וְעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> on הַחֲתוּמִ֑ים <S%H2856><s%> Now those that sealed נְחֶמְיָ֧ה <S%H5166><s%> [were] Nehemiah הַתִּרְשָׁ֛תָא <S%H8660><s%> the Tirshatha בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son חֲכַלְיָ֖ה <S%H2446><s%> of Hachaliah וְצִדְקִיָּֽה׃ <S%H6667><s%> and Zidkijah
שְׂרָיָ֥ה <S%H8304><s%> Seraiah עֲזַרְיָ֖ה <S%H5838><s%> Azariah יִרְמְיָֽה׃ <S%H3414><s%> Jeremiah
פַּשְׁח֥וּר <S%H6583><s%> Pashur אֲמַרְיָ֖ה <S%H568><s%> Amariah מַלְכִּיָּֽה׃ <S%H4441><s%> Malchijah
חַטּ֥וּשׁ <S%H2407><s%> Hattush שְׁבַנְיָ֖ה <S%H7645><s%> Shebaniah מַלּֽוּךְ׃ <S%H4409><s%> Malluch
חָרִ֥ם <S%H2766><s%> Harim מְרֵמ֖וֹת <S%H4822><s%> Meremoth עֹֽבַדְיָֽה׃ <S%H5662><s%> Obadiah
דָּנִיֵּ֥אל <S%H1840><s%> Daniel גִּנְּת֖וֹן <S%H1599><s%> Ginnethon בָּרֽוּךְ׃ <S%H1263><s%> Baruch
מְשֻׁלָּ֥ם <S%H4918><s%> Meshullam אֲבִיָּ֖ה <S%H29><s%> Abijah מִיָּמִֽן׃ <S%H4326><s%> Mijamin
מַֽעַזְיָ֥ה <S%H4590><s%> Maaziah בִלְגַּ֖י <S%H1084><s%> Bilgai שְׁמַֽעְיָ֑ה <S%H8098><s%> Shemaiah אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These הַכֹּהֲנִֽים׃ <S%H3548><s%> these [were] the priests ס

וְֽהַלְוִיִּ֑ם <S%H3881><s%> And the Levites וְיֵשׁ֙וּעַ֙ <S%H3442><s%> both Jeshua בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֲזַנְיָ֔ה <S%H245><s%> of Azaniah בִּנּ֕וּי <S%H1131><s%> Binnui מִבְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of the sons חֵנָדָ֖ד <S%H2582><s%> of Henadad קַדְמִיאֵֽל׃ <S%H6934><s%> Kadmiel

וַאֲחֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H251><s%> And their brethren שְׁבַנְיָ֧ה <S%H7645><s%> Shebaniah הֽוֹדִיָּ֛ה <S%H1940><s%> Hodiah קְלִיטָ֖א <S%H7042><s%> Kelita פְּלָאיָ֥ה <S%H6411><s%> Pelaiah חָנָֽן׃ <S%H2605><s%> Hanan
מִיכָ֥א <S%H4316><s%> Micha רְח֖וֹב <S%H7340><s%> Rehob חֲשַׁבְיָֽה׃ <S%H2811><s%> Hashabiah
זַכּ֥וּר <S%H2139><s%> Zaccur שֵׁרֵֽבְיָ֖ה <S%H8274><s%> Sherebiah שְׁבַנְיָֽה׃ <S%H7645><s%> Shebaniah
הוֹדִיָּ֥ה <S%H1940><s%> Hodiah בָנִ֖י <S%H1137><s%> Bani בְּנִֽינוּ׃ <S%H1148><s%> Beninu ס

רָאשֵׁ֖י <S%H7218><s%> The chief הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people פַּרְעֹשׁ֙ <S%H6551><s%> Parosh פַּחַ֣ת מוֹאָ֔ב <S%H6355><s%> Pahathmoab עֵילָ֥ם <S%H5867><s%> Elam זַתּ֖וּא <S%H2240><s%> Zatthu בָּנִֽי׃ <S%H1137><s%> Bani
בֻּנִּ֥י <S%H1138><s%> Bunni עַזְגָּ֖ד <S%H5803><s%> Azgad בֵּבָֽי׃ <S%H893><s%> Bebai
אֲדֹנִיָּ֥ה <S%H138><s%> Adonijah בִגְוַ֖י <S%H902><s%> Bigvai עָדִֽין׃ <S%H5720><s%> Adin
אָטֵ֥ר <S%H333><s%> Ater חִזְקִיָּ֖ה <S%H2396><s%> Hizkijah עַזּֽוּר׃ <S%H5809><s%> Azzur
הוֹדִיָּ֥ה <S%H1940><s%> Hodiah חָשֻׁ֖ם <S%H2828><s%> Hashum בֵּצָֽי׃ <S%H1209><s%> Bezai
חָרִ֥יף <S%H2756><s%> Hariph עֲנָת֖וֹת <S%H6068><s%> Anathoth [נֹובָי כ] (נֵיבָֽי׃ <S%H5109><s%> Nebai ק)
מַגְפִּיעָ֥שׁ <S%H4047><s%> Magpiash מְשֻׁלָּ֖ם <S%H4918><s%> Meshullam חֵזִֽיר׃ <S%H2387><s%> Hezir
מְשֵׁיזַבְאֵ֥ל <S%H4898><s%> Meshezabeel צָד֖וֹק <S%H6659><s%> Zadok יַדּֽוּעַ׃ <S%H3037><s%> Jaddua
פְּלַטְיָ֥ה <S%H6410><s%> Pelatiah חָנָ֖ן <S%H2605><s%> Hanan עֲנָיָֽה׃ <S%H6043><s%> Anaiah
הוֹשֵׁ֥עַ <S%H1954><s%> Hoshea חֲנַנְיָ֖ה <S%H2608><s%> Hananiah חַשּֽׁוּב׃ <S%H2815><s%> Hashub
הַלּוֹחֵ֥שׁ <S%H3873><s%> Hallohesh פִּלְחָ֖א <S%H6401><s%> Pileha שׁוֹבֵֽק׃ <S%H7733><s%> Shobek
רְח֥וּם <S%H7348><s%> Rehum חֲשַׁבְנָ֖ה <S%H2812><s%> Hashabnah מַעֲשֵׂיָֽה׃ <S%H4641><s%> Maaseiah
וַאֲחִיָּ֥ה <S%H281><s%> And Ahijah חָנָ֖ן <S%H2605><s%> Hanan עָנָֽן׃ <S%H6052><s%> Anan
מַלּ֥וּךְ <S%H4409><s%> Malluch חָרִ֖ם <S%H2766><s%> Harim בַּעֲנָֽה׃ <S%H1196><s%> Baanah

וּשְׁאָ֣ר <S%H7605><s%> And the rest הָעָ֡ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people הַכֹּהֲנִ֣ים <S%H3548><s%> the priests הַ֠לְוִיִּם <S%H3881><s%> the Levites הַשּׁוֹעֲרִ֨ים <S%H7778><s%> the porters הַמְשֹׁרְרִ֜ים <S%H7891><s%> the singers הַנְּתִינִ֗ים <S%H5411><s%> the Nethinims וְֽכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַנִּבְדָּ֞ל <S%H914><s%> and all they that had separated מֵעַמֵּ֤י <S%H5971><s%> themselves from the people הָאֲרָצוֹת֙ <S%H776><s%> of the lands אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to תּוֹרַ֣ת <S%H8451><s%> unto the law הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> of God נְשֵׁיהֶ֖ם <S%H802><s%> their wives בְּנֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H1121><s%> their sons וּבְנֹתֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H1323><s%> and their daughters כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all יוֹדֵ֥עַ <S%H3045><s%> every one having knowledge מֵבִֽין׃ <S%H995><s%> and having understanding

מַחֲזִיקִ֣ים <S%H2388><s%> They clave עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> with אֲחֵיהֶם֮ <S%H251><s%> to their brethren אַדִּירֵיהֶם֒ <S%H117><s%> their nobles וּבָאִ֞ים <S%H935><s%> and entered בְּאָלָ֣ה <S%H423><s%> into a curse וּבִשְׁבוּעָ֗ה <S%H7621><s%> and into an oath לָלֶ֙כֶת֙ <S%H1980><s%> to walk בְּתוֹרַ֣ת <S%H8451><s%> law הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> in God's אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which נִתְּנָ֔ה <S%H5414><s%> which was given בְּיַ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> by מֹשֶׁ֣ה <S%H4872><s%> Moses עֶֽבֶד־ <S%H5650><s%> the servant הָֽאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> of God וְלִשְׁמ֣וֹר <S%H8104><s%> and to observe וְלַעֲשׂ֗וֹת <S%H6213><s%> and do אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מִצְוֹת֙ <S%H4687><s%> all the commandments יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֲדֹנֵ֔ינוּ <S%H136><s%> our Lord וּמִשְׁפָּטָ֖יו <S%H4941><s%> and his judgments וְחֻקָּֽיו׃ <S%H2706><s%> and his statutes

וַאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> after לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> we will not נִתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> And that we would not give בְּנֹתֵ֖ינוּ <S%H1323><s%> our daughters לְעַמֵּ֣י <S%H5971><s%> unto the people הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֹ֣תֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H1323><s%> their daughters לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> or נִקַּ֖ח <S%H3947><s%> nor take לְבָנֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H1121><s%> for our sons

וְעַמֵּ֣י <S%H5971><s%> And [if] the people הָאָ֡רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land הַֽמְבִיאִים֩ <S%H935><s%> bring אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמַּקָּח֨וֹת <S%H4728><s%> ware וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> any שֶׁ֜בֶר <S%H7668><s%> or any victuals בְּי֤וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשַּׁבָּת֙ <S%H7676><s%> on the sabbath לִמְכּ֔וֹר <S%H4376><s%> to sell לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> we will not נִקַּ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> [that] we would not buy מֵהֶ֛ם <S%H1992><s%> like בַּשַּׁבָּ֖ת <S%H7676><s%> it of them on the sabbath וּבְי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day קֹ֑דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> or on the holy וְנִטֹּ֛שׁ <S%H5203><s%> and [that] we would leave אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשָּׁנָ֥ה <S%H8141><s%> year הַשְּׁבִיעִ֖ית <S%H7637><s%> the seventh וּמַשָּׁ֥א <S%H4855><s%> and the exaction כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> of every יָֽד׃ <S%H3027><s%> of every debt

וְהֶעֱמַ֤דְנוּ <S%H5975><s%> Also we made עָלֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H5921><s%> under מִצְוֹ֔ת <S%H4687><s%> ordinances לָתֵ֥ת <S%H5414><s%> for us to charge עָלֵ֛ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> under שְׁלִשִׁ֥ית <S%H7992><s%> with the third part הַשֶּׁ֖קֶל <S%H8255><s%> of a shekel בַּשָּׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> ourselves yearly לַעֲבֹדַ֖ת <S%H5656><s%> for the service בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H430><s%> of our God

לְלֶ֣חֶם <S%H3899><s%> bread הַֽמַּעֲרֶ֡כֶת <S%H4635><s%> row וּמִנְחַ֣ת <S%H4503><s%> meat offering הַתָּמִ֣יד <S%H8548><s%> and for the continual וּלְעוֹלַ֣ת <S%H5930><s%> burnt offering הַ֠תָּמִיד <S%H8548><s%> and for the continual הַשַּׁבָּת֨וֹת <S%H7676><s%> of the sabbaths הֶחֳדָשִׁ֜ים <S%H2320><s%> of the new moons לַמּוֹעֲדִ֗ים <S%H4150><s%> for the set feasts וְלַקֳּדָשִׁים֙ <S%H6944><s%> and for the holy וְלַ֣חַטָּא֔וֹת <S%H2403><s%> [things] and for the sin offerings לְכַפֵּ֖ר <S%H3722><s%> to make an atonement עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> for יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> for Israel וְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> and all מְלֶ֥אכֶת <S%H4399><s%> and [for] all the work בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H430><s%> of our God ס

וְהַגּוֹרָל֨וֹת <S%H1486><s%> the lots הִפַּ֜לְנוּ <S%H5307><s%> And we cast עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> for קֻרְבַּ֣ן <S%H7133><s%> offering הָעֵצִ֗ים <S%H6086><s%> for the wood הַכֹּהֲנִ֣ים <S%H3548><s%> among the priests הַלְוִיִּם֮ <S%H3881><s%> the Levites וְהָעָם֒ <S%H5971><s%> and the people לְ֠הָבִיא <S%H935><s%> to bring לְבֵ֨ית <S%H1004><s%> [it] into the house אֱלֹהֵ֧ינוּ <S%H430><s%> of our God לְבֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> after the houses אֲבֹתֵ֛ינוּ <S%H1><s%> of our fathers לְעִתִּ֥ים <S%H6256><s%> at times מְזֻמָּנִ֖ים <S%H2163><s%> appointed שָׁנָ֣ה <S%H8141><s%> year בְשָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> by year לְבַעֵ֗ר <S%H1197><s%> to burn עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on מִזְבַּח֙ <S%H4196><s%> upon the altar יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God כַּכָּת֖וּב <S%H3789><s%> as [it is] written בַּתּוֹרָֽה׃ <S%H8451><s%> in the law

וּלְהָבִ֞יא <S%H935><s%> And to bring אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בִּכּוּרֵ֣י <S%H1061><s%> the firstfruits אַדְמָתֵ֗נוּ <S%H127><s%> of our ground וּבִכּוּרֵ֛י <S%H1061><s%> and the firstfruits כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all פְּרִ֥י <S%H6529><s%> of all fruit כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> of every עֵ֖ץ <S%H6086><s%> of all trees שָׁנָ֣ה <S%H8141><s%> year בְשָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> by year לְבֵ֖ית <S%H1004><s%> unto the house יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּכֹר֤וֹת <S%H1060><s%> Also the firstborn בָּנֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H1121><s%> of our sons וּבְהֶמְתֵּ֔ינוּ <S%H929><s%> and of our cattle כַּכָּת֖וּב <S%H3789><s%> as [it is] written בַּתּוֹרָ֑ה <S%H8451><s%> in the law וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּכוֹרֵ֨י <S%H1060><s%> and the firstborn בְקָרֵ֜ינוּ <S%H1241><s%> of our herds וְצֹאנֵ֗ינוּ <S%H6629><s%> and of our flocks לְהָבִיא֙ <S%H935><s%> to bring לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> to the house אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <S%H430><s%> of our God לַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <S%H3548><s%> unto the priests הַמְשָׁרְתִ֖ים <S%H8334><s%> that minister בְּבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> in the house אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H430><s%> of our God

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רֵאשִׁ֣ית <S%H7225><s%> the firstfruits עֲרִיסֹתֵ֣ינוּ <S%H6182><s%> of our dough וּ֠תְרוּמֹתֵינוּ <S%H8641><s%> and our offerings וּפְרִ֨י <S%H6529><s%> and the fruit כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> of every עֵ֜ץ <S%H6086><s%> of all manner of trees תִּיר֣וֹשׁ <S%H8492><s%> of wine וְיִצְהָ֗ר <S%H3323><s%> and of oil נָבִ֤יא <S%H935><s%> And [that] we should bring לַכֹּהֲנִים֙ <S%H3548><s%> unto the priests אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> at לִשְׁכ֣וֹת <S%H3957><s%> to the chambers בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <S%H430><s%> of our God וּמַעְשַׂ֥ר <S%H4643><s%> and the tithes אַדְמָתֵ֖נוּ <S%H127><s%> of our ground לַלְוִיִּ֑ם <S%H3881><s%> unto the Levites וְהֵם֙ <S%H1992><s%> for הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> that the same Levites הַֽמְעַשְּׂרִ֔ים <S%H6237><s%> might have the tithes בְּכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all עָרֵ֥י <S%H5892><s%> in all the cities עֲבֹדָתֵֽנוּ׃ <S%H5656><s%> of our tillage

וְהָיָ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> become הַכֹּהֵ֧ן <S%H3548><s%> And the priest בֶּֽן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אַהֲרֹ֛ן <S%H175><s%> of Aaron עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> shall be with הַלְוִיִּ֖ם <S%H3881><s%> shall be with the Levites בַּעְשֵׂ֣ר <S%H6237><s%> take tithes הַלְוִיִּ֑ם <S%H3881><s%> when the Levites וְהַלְוִיִּ֞ם <S%H3881><s%> and the Levites יַעֲל֨וּ <S%H5927><s%> shall bring up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַעֲשַׂ֤ר <S%H4643><s%> the tithe הַֽמַּעֲשֵׂר֙ <S%H4643><s%> of the tithes לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> unto the house אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <S%H430><s%> of our God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַלְּשָׁכ֖וֹת <S%H3957><s%> to the chambers לְבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> house הָאוֹצָֽר׃ <S%H214><s%> into the treasure

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַ֠לְּשָׁכוֹת <S%H3957><s%> unto the chambers יָבִ֨יאוּ <S%H935><s%> shall bring בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> For the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> and the children הַלֵּוִ֗י <S%H3878><s%> of Levi אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> תְּרוּמַ֣ת <S%H8641><s%> the offering הַדָּגָן֮ <S%H1715><s%> of the corn הַתִּיר֣וֹשׁ <S%H8492><s%> of the new wine וְהַיִּצְהָר֒ <S%H3323><s%> and the oil וְשָׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> there כְּלֵ֣י <S%H3627><s%> where [are] the vessels הַמִּקְדָּ֔שׁ <S%H4720><s%> of the sanctuary וְהַכֹּהֲנִים֙ <S%H3548><s%> and the priests הַמְשָׁ֣רְתִ֔ים <S%H8334><s%> that minister וְהַשּׁוֹעֲרִ֖ים <S%H7778><s%> and the porters וְהַמְשֹׁרְרִ֑ים <S%H7891><s%> and the singers וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> we will not נַעֲזֹ֖ב <S%H5800><s%> and we will not forsake אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> the house אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H430><s%> of our God
